DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect regular low fat diary consumption marker cardiovascular ( CV ) metabolic ( cardiometabolic ) health include body composition ( % body fat , body weight ) , blood lipid , blood glucose , arterial compliance , blood pressure , insulin sensitivity rest metabolic rate .
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-centre , randomize , dietary intervention study 12 month . A total 100 overweight/obese individual recruit , half recruit Adelaide , South Australia half Manitoba , Canada . At baseline , subject assign HD give standard serf low fat dairy product ( eg . 250mL milk , 200g yoghurt ) regular basis 6 month ask incorporate 4 serves/day diet . Volunteers randomize LD ask continue habitual diet consume le 2 serf dairy regular basis 6 month . All participant ask complete food frequency questionnaire , physical activity diary , 3-day food record , keep record dairy serf ( food log ) consume day . In total , participant ask come centre 5 time throughout study . However , HD group ask return centre every two week receive diary product return dairy record ( food log ) . At baseline subject ask attend Richardson Centre Functional Foods Nutraceuticals ( RCFFN ) fast various measurement include : body weight , blood pressure , arterial compliance , dual energy x-ray absorptiometry ( DEXA ) scan measurement body fat , abdominal fat bone mineral density , waist hip circumference provide blood sample measurement blood lipid , insulin glucose .
DOC.criteria: BMI ≥25 kg/m2 , assess agerelated healthy base prestudy screen examination include : medical history diet lifestyle history physical measurement ( height , weight blood pressure ) . Pregnancy likely pregnant ( ionize radiation DEXA ) Weight ≥135kg ( exceed capacity DEXA scanner ) diagnose diabetes cardiovascular disease Liver renal disease Regular use appetite suppressant Irregular use treatment might interfere outcome study ( e.g antihypertensive , statin , thyroxine , omega3 supplement etc ) .
